mapper.insert: insert into healthtory_goods(goodsNum, goodsName, goodsPrice, goodsStock, goodsPart) values (#{goodsNum}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsStock}, #{goodsPart})
mapper.update: update healthtory_goods set goodsNum = #{goodsNum}, goodsName = #{goodsName}, goodsPart = #{goodsPart}, goodsPrice = #{goodsPrice}, goodsStock = #{goodsStock} where goodsNum = ${goodsNum}
